scenario.init: Machine is in normal operation; hydraulic pressure level sensor is functioning normally and reporting a constant, stable pressure reading.
scenario.expected_result: Pressure stays constant at its true value, with no unexpected fluctuations in the level sensor output.
scenario.instead_failure: The defective pressure‑level sensor outputs random values outside the normal range—spiking both above and below the true pressure—until it falsely triggers a pressure fault alarm. Operator acknowledges the fault and terminates the experiment.
